description: A code that records tumour stage grouping
name: TumourStageGrouping

text.div:
TumourStageGrouping

A code that records tumour stage grouping

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tumour-stage-grouping defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
0 0 Tis N0 M0
i I T1 N0 M0 T2 N0 M0
iia IIA T3 N0 M0
iib IIB T4a N0 M0
iic IIC T4b N0 M0
iiia IIIA T1-T2 N1/N1c M0 T1 N2a M0
iiib IIIB T3-T4a N1/N1c M0 T2-T3 N2a M0 T1-T2 N2b M0
iiic IIIC T4a N2a M0 T3-T4a N2b M0 T4b N1-N2 M0
iva IVA Any T Any N M1a
ivb IVB Any T Any N M1b
